entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Stony Plain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 a.m. MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
